hero.title: Code Vimarsh
hero.subtitle: Where Ideas Transform Into Reality
hero.description: A thriving community of passionate developers, innovators, and problem-solvers. We believe in learning together, building together, and growing together.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building Tomorrow's Developers Today
about.content: Code Vimarsh is more than just a coding club—it's a launchpad for innovation. We bring together students from diverse backgrounds united by their passion for technology and programming.

points.title: Learn & Grow
points.description: Master cutting-edge technologies through hands-on workshops, peer learning, and expert sessions.

points.title: Collaborate
points.description: Build real-world projects with fellow developers, fostering teamwork and innovation.

points.title: Innovate
points.description: Transform ideas into impactful solutions through hackathons and coding challenges.

points.title: Connect
points.description: Network with industry professionals, alumni, and the global developer community.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Join us in our journey of learning and innovation

items.title: Web Development Bootcamp
items.description: An intensive workshop covering modern web technologies including React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Perfect for beginners looking to build their first full-stack application.

items.title: Code Sprint 2025
items.description: Our flagship hackathon where teams compete to build innovative solutions for real-world problems. Amazing prizes and networking opportunities await!

items.title: AI/ML Workshop Series
items.description: Dive into the world of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Learn to build intelligent systems using Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.

items.title: Open Source Contribution Day
items.description: Learn how to contribute to open source projects. We'll guide you through your first PR and help you become part of the global developer community.

team.title: Meet The Team
team.subtitle: The passionate minds behind Code Vimarsh

footer.description: A community of developers building the future, one line of code at a time.
